ETX.F.summary: Ãtablissements Maurel & Prom S.A., an oil company, engages in the exploration and production of hydrocarbons in Gabon, Tanzania, and internationally. It operates in three segments: Exploration, Production, and Drilling. As of February 7, 2019, the company had proven and probable gross oil reserves of 190 million barrels of oil equivalent. The company was founded in 1831 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Ãtablissements Maurel & Prom S.A. is a subsidiary of PT Pertamina Internasional Eksplorasi dan Produksi.
